title: Local path package does not autoload classes
body:
I'm about to write post about local packages, but there is one thing that blocks me.

I use [path local package](https://getcomposer.org/doc/05-repositories.md#path).

I need to autoload-dev and require-dev dependencies so I could run tests on those local packages.
Without that, I have to put this into main `composer.json`, which kinda kills the decoupling to path package.

Is there a way to do that?
